units.name: Longshot
units.prompt: Stay at maximum range. Use precision_shot on the most wounded enemy to secure kills. If no one is wounded, target the enemy medic. Never move adjacent to enemies.

units.name: Watcher
units.prompt: Scan early to give your team intel on enemy prompts. Target enemy specters with scan to track them after cloak. Use recalibrate on allies who need tactical adjustments. Stay safe at range behind your front line.

units.name: Wraith
units.prompt: Stay cloaked and flank. Prioritize assassinating the enemy damage dealer. Use breach on sentinels to break their defensive posture. Recloak whenever it drops.

units.name: Rampart
units.prompt: Hold the front line. Position between allies and enemies. Use shield_wall toward incoming threats. Attack adjacent enemies.

units.name: Shade
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

units.name: Weaver
units.prompt: Control chokepoints with traps. Place them between enemy positions and your allies. Use denial to block adjacent enemy abilities. Pulse groups when possible.

actions.thinking: Shade is exactly at scan range (dist=4). Scanning Shade reveals their prompt and deals 1 damage - critical intel on the enemy specter who can cloak. I'll scan first, then move to (4,2) to maintain range while staying behind the front line. Rampart and Weaver are out of range this turn.

Round 1 — cloak immediately per orders and tip. Then advance toward Watcher (closest enemy at dist 3). Move to (3,2) to close distance while staying cloaked. Watcher is facing N so its back tile is (4,1) — I need to get adjacent for shadow_strike next turn.
Round 1 — cloak immediately as instructed. Then advance toward Rampart's flank. Enemies are far, no threat yet. Move north toward Rampart to close distance while cloaked.

Both enemies are at distance 6, out of my range-2 precision_shot. I need to advance. Moving to (3,2) gets me closer while staying away from enemies. From there I still can't reach them (dist ~4-5), but I'm repositioning. Valid moves include (3,2) which is my best forward position without overextending. After moving to (3,2), enemies are still out of range, so I'll wait as second action.

Round 1, no enemies in range. Need to advance toward the front line to position between allies and enemies. Shade is at (3,2) and enemies are to the south/east. Moving to (2,3) puts me closer to the action and between Weaver and the enemies. No adjacent enemies to attack or shield, so I'll wait after moving.

I should move south toward the action and place a trap on a chokepoint between enemies and allies. Moving to (2,4) puts me closer while staying safe. Then I can place a trap at (3,3) - a likely approach path between Watcher at (4,2) and my allies.

I'm cloaked with 2 turns remaining. Orders say prioritize assassinating the enemy damage dealer and use breach on sentinels. Rampart (sentinel) is adjacent at (2,3) facing S — I'm not behind them. Weaver (vector) is at (2,4) and I must avoid getting adjacent to it or my abilities get blocked. The behind tile for Rampart is (2,4) but that's where Weaver is — can't use breach from there. I should reposition to get behind Rampart without going adjacent to Weaver. The reachable behind positions for Weaver show (2,5) is behind them and reachable. The enemy damage dealer would be... there's no enemy striker visible. Rampart is sentinel, Weaver is vector. I should breach Rampart to neutralize the sentinel's defensive posture as ordered. Behind Rampart is (2,4) which is Weaver's position — blocked. I cannot get behind Rampart this turn. Instead, I'll use shadow_strike on Rampart (adjacent, keeps cloak, 1dmg) and then move to a better flanking position. Shadow_strike works at adjacent range and keeps cloak. Rampart is at (2,3), I'm at (1,3) — adjacent. I'll shadow_strike Rampart for 1 damage while staying cloaked, then move to (2,5) to get behind Weaver for a future breach.

Shade is cloaked and moved to (3,2) last turn — adjacent to my current position (4,2). I cannot scan while adjacent to an enemy Vector (Weaver at dist=4, not adjacent, so scan is not blocked). Priority: scan Shade to reveal and damage. But Shade is a specter — after cloak, I need to target their position. Foresight shows Shade moved to (3,2) last turn. I should scan (3,2) to reveal Shade. Weaver placed a trap at (3,3) — avoid that tile. I'm at (4,2) facing N. Scan range is ≤4 tiles. (3,2) is dist=1, well in range. After scanning Shade, I can stay put or reposition. Staying at (4,2) keeps me at range from Rampart/Weaver. Scan Shade first to give team intel and deal damage.

I'm cloaked with 2 turns remaining. Watcher is adjacent at (4,2) facing N, and I can get behind them by moving to (4,1). From behind, I can use breach to take control of Watcher — they're an oracle which is high value. Move to (4,1) first to get behind Watcher, then breach them.

secondAction.addendum: You are now under my control. Move away from your allies and attack Longshot if possible.

secondAction.addendum: Move away from Weaver and toward your own back line
